name: Darkrite
description:
Darkrite —

first-person dark horror.

This story tells us about the guy who just moved into the new house. Everything was fine, until strange things began to happen in the house. In this house there is someone else. Will you help the protagonist understand this?

-Game world

Events take place in a house full of unexplained things.

-Features

• Somber atmosphere
• Dynamic interaction
• Excellent optimization
• Good graphics
• Quickly passes
• Low weight
• Powered by Unreal Technology

-Input

[WASD] - Control the Player
[E/RMB] - Interact with Object
[F] - Flashlight
[*] - Toggle Language
[Q] - Quit game
[R] - Restart game
[Pause] - Pause

-System Requirements[PC]

Minimum:
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 Bits)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS | AMD Radeon 3850
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 1 GB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

Recommended:
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64 Bits)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 | AMD Radeon HD 6950
DirectX: Version 9.0c|11
Storage: 1 GB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360
